item.title: How did Jeffrey Epstein make all of his money?
item.description: Newly released documents are renewing interest in how Jeffrey Epstein amassed his fortune. Here's how he made his money.

item.title: US designates Colombian cocaine gang a terrorist group
item.description: The move is seen as a further escalation of the Trump administration's war on drugs in Latin America.

item.title: Second doctor sentenced in Matthew Perry overdose death
item.description: Dr Mark Chavez, one of five people who pleaded guilty in the Friends star's death, was sentenced to eight months of home detention.
